sock heel only you can insert this heel into any cuff-down sock pattern ★ this heel is designed to be knit at nearly any gauge find the total stitch count of your sock then follow the corresponding instructions ★ your total stitch count before starting the heel must be a multiple of 4 ★ this pattern uses the magic loop method and refers to the front needle fn and back needle bn ★ when working the heel increases be sure to pick up the bar between the stitches not the bar created from slipping the stitches ★ you can knit the heel turn in a contrasting yarn ○ work across the fn using the main color in a contrast color complete step 1 when you re ready for step 2 continue working across the bn as instructed then slip all the fn stitches so you re ready to work with the main color again with
